The Hollywood superstar Bruce Willis (Armageddon / New York Besieged) shines in this powerful performance thiller supernatural, which critics hailed as one of the best films of the year! Dr. Malcolm Crowe (Willis) is a renowned child psychologist, who is tormented by the terrible memory of a young patient he was unable to help. When he meets Cole Sear (Haley Joel Osment, Forrest Gump), a boy of 8 years scared and confused, with a similar problem, Dr. Crowe seeks to redeem his past mistake by doing all boy. Nonetheless, Malcolm is unprepared to learn the truth that terrifies Cole. This unforgettable and intense film, will leave you impressed from beginning to end, with the discovery of Cole's sixth sense that leads them both to mysterious and unforeseeable consequences, with a surprise ending.
